entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL, THEN SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE AFTERNOON
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
